# S3verless Examples - Required Dependencies

# Core framework
s3verless>=0.1.0

# Web server
uvicorn>=0.24.0
python-multipart>=0.0.6

# Optional: For local development without AWS
localstack>=3.0.0

# The following are already included as s3verless dependencies:
# - fastapi
# - pydantic
# - aiobotocore
# - python-jose[cryptography]
# - passlib[bcrypt]
